body_content.explanation: If a plan or a hope is unrealized, it has not been achieved or has not happened:
examples: Her promises for sweeping reforms remain unrealized.
He left dozens of plans for unrealised projects.

body_content.explanation: An unrealized profit or loss exists when you own something that will create a future profit or loss when you sell it:
examples: The bank is sitting on unrealized gains on its holdings worth billions.
The company also has roughly 100 billion yen of unrealised losses from falling property prices.
